activities: We are a small technology company that produces a small business CRM product. As a result, we collect personal information from our customers to create an account, which we then store on our servers. Finally, users will store personal information of their contacts/customers, including phone numbers, email addresses, physical addresses, etc. We do not use or distribute this information, but it is stored on our servers and not locally.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All data containing email addresses, phone numbers, physical addresses, or any other identifying information will be covered by the Safe Harbor Framework. This includes all information from individuals signing up for accounts, as well as the information of contacts entered into our databases. This data is handled automatically, and is not manually processed.
